LanguageData.StyleChangeAnytimeShowAllStylesTooltip: If enabled, it'll always show all styles - even if they're not part of the player's ideology.
LanguageData.StyleChangeAnytimeUsePrimaryIdeoOnlyTool: Determines if only the primary colony ideology is used, or should the minor ones also be included.
LanguageData.StyleChangeAnytimeIgnoreFactionCheckTool: If enabled, it'll be possible to change the style of anything not owned by the player (normally, only things that are owned or cannot have faction can be modified).
LanguageData.StyleChangeAnytimeApplyToBuildingsToolti: If enabled, it'll be possible to change the style of already crafted items (when a valid building is selected).
LanguageData.StyleChangeAnytimeApplyToBlueprintsToolt: If enabled, it'll be possible to change the style of blueprints (when a valid blueprint is selected).
LanguageData.StyleChangeAnytimeApplyToFramesTooltip: If enabled, it'll be possible to change the style of frames (buildings under construction, only visible once fully constructed) (when a valid frame is selected).
LanguageData.StyleChangeAnytimeApplyToItemsTooltip: If enabled, it'll be possible to change the style of already crafted items (when a valid item is selected).
LanguageData.StyleChangeAnytimeApplyToPlantsTooltip: If enabled, it'll be possible to change the style of already crafted plants (when a valid plants is selected).
LanguageData.StyleChangeAnytimeApplyToChunksTooltip: if enabled, it'll be possible to change the style of chunks (when a valid chunk is selected).
LanguageData.StyleChangeAnytimeApplyToBillsTooltip: If enabled, it'll be possible to change the style of bill (inside of bill config window).
LanguageData.StyleChangeAnytimeDevModeLogsTooltip: Enables extra logs when launching the game.
